original_text: No! But I tell you this. All of you have done many bad things. So you must change how you live and you must turn to God. If you do not, you will also die as they did.
korean_text: 너희에게 이르노니 아니라 너희도 만일 회개하지 아니하면 다 이와 같이 망하리라

sentences.original_text: All of you have done many bad things.
sentences.korean_translation: 너희 모두가 많은 나쁜 일들을 행했다.

sentences.original_text: So you must change how you live
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 너희는 살아가는 방식을 바꿔야 하고

sentences.original_text: and you must turn to God.
you will also die as they did.
